name: Classic Flickr header and navigation
description: This makes the Flickr header area (global navigation and subnavigation) look mostly like it used to  before the disastrous redesign on 20 May 2013. With the photostream Edit view (append ?details=1 to the photostream URL), it looks a lot like it used to. VERY EARLY VERSION, BUGGY
additional_info:
v0.1 Very rough still, not tested on other pages at all, still need a lot of testing and improvement. Known bug: Makes links to Photostream | Sets | Favorites not work
v0.2 Links to Photostream | Sets | Favorites now work. Change userstyle title from "old-style" to "classic"
